title: Shruti Seth teases a Shararat season 2 on Instagram. Could it be true? | tv | Hindustan Times
text:
Shruti Seth teases a Shararat season 2 on Instagram. Could it be true? tv Updated: Feb 09, 2017 21:44 IST Hindustan Times Shararat ran for 192 episodes on Star Plus. 
Actor Shruti Seth’s new Instagram post might come as a fun surprise for fans of her hit TV show Shararat. 
The actor took to the photo sharing site to post an image of herself with actor Karanvir Bohra, who was her co-star in the show, which ran from 2004-2009. 
“Getting ready for season two of ‘Shararat’,” Shruti captioned the image. A photo posted by Shruti Seth (@shru2kill) on Feb 8, 2017 at 6:45am PST 
Shararat ran for 192 episodes on Star Plus and also starred Farida Jalal and Daisy Irani. The show made Shruti Seth a household name and slowly became a cult hit. 
Another show which is making a comeback is the hit comedy Sarabhai vs Sarabhai . It will air as a web series in 2017. Read more
